about.companySubtitle: Business is in our breath. That's how we always make it the best.
about.companyDescription: We are a paramount group of business services in various genres such as facility management, transport & logistics, construction & engineering, plant hire & heavy machinery rental, real estate, and agriculture trading. Established in 1970, Al Baida Group has built and maintained a group of companies encompassing various commercial sectors ranging from facility management to infrastructure services and more.

contactUs.title: Do you have any questions?
contactUs.subTitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions or need assistance, our team is ready to help. Contact us via our form, phone, or email, and let's build a successful future together.
contactUs.askUs: Ask us everything and we would love to hear from you

cards.title: Facility Management
cards.description: We offer complete integrated facility solutions that help leverage a smooth functioning of your business facility.

cards.title: Agriculture projects & training
cards.description: The world is nothing with no pastures and peasants. Agriculture is the sole reason for our very existence.

cards.title: Contracting & Trading
cards.description: Al Baida Group is a company driven by a vision aligned to the National Vision of Qatar. We go beyond mere transactions, instead building mutually beneficial relationships with our clients.

cards.title: Infrastructure & project development
cards.description: Infrastructure is truly the backbone of growth and prosperity of a nation. Our venture in the sector of road construction has delivered and developed world-class projects in Qatar.

cards.title: Cleaning Services
cards.description: Al Baida Group has made its distinct name for the last 20 years in providing exceptional cleaning services for post-construction & commercial cleaning and residential cleaning.

cards.title: Heavy Equipment Rental
cards.description: Heavy equipment is an indispensable section for a flourishing industry. The equipment requirement varies based on market segments.

cards.title: HR Management & Outsourcing
cards.description: With a stringent selection procedure, we can provide a range of workforce to meet our clients' needs, ranging from clerks to IT professionals and Project Managers.

cards.title: Cargo logistics & Custom Clearance
cards.description: Al Baida Cargo & Customs Clearance is considered a unique company in the field of Cargo & Customs Clearance.

cards.title: Engineering Consultancy
cards.description: Al Baida Group Engineering Consultancy team is made up of well-experienced, qualified, and dedicated team of Architects and Engineers and familiarized in obtaining approvals from concerned Government Authorities.

cards.title: Business Management Consultancy
cards.description: We offer a variety of business and management consulting services that support your business needs. We offer solutions to support your growth plan and optimize your organization.

cards.title: Agency Representation
cards.description: Al Baida has been a Business conglomerate since 1970, maintaining strong business ties within Qatar. AL Baida assists agencies in gaining representation in Qatar.

cards.title: Construction
cards.description: We specialize in building construction, including ground plus two stories, warehouses, mosques, villa complexes, fencing, and other construction projects.

heroSection.title: Your Trusted Partner in
heroSection.subTitle: Comprehensive Project Solutions
heroSection.description: At Al Baida, we deliver reliable solutions across Facility Management, Agriculture, Contracting, Infrastructure, and more. From HR Outsourcing to Engineering Consultancy, our expertise drives impactful, high-quality results for every project.

ourHistory.heading: Our History
ourHistory.subHeading: Discover the journey that has shaped us into a trusted leader in comprehensive project solutions.

cardData.title: The Beginning
cardData.description: Established in 1990, our company began with a vision to provide unparalleled services across various industries. We laid our foundation on values of integrity, quality, and innovation, quickly gaining the trust of clients and partners alike.

cardData.title: Expansion and Growth
cardData.description: Through the early 2000s, we expanded our capabilities, integrating cutting-edge technology and a commitment to sustainable practices. Our team grew, bringing in expertise and talent that propelled our company forward, allowing us to serve a global client base.

cardData.title: A Commitment to Innovation
cardData.description: In the past decade, we have embraced new technologies and innovative approaches, reinforcing our position as industry leaders. Our projects reflect our dedication to providing forward-thinking solutions that adapt to the ever-evolving landscape of global markets.

cardData.title: Today and Beyond
cardData.description: Today, we stand as a trusted partner in comprehensive project solutions. Looking ahead, our focus remains on delivering value-driven services that not only meet but exceed expectations, ensuring a legacy of excellence for future generations.

partners.subTitle: Al Baida group has developed partnerships with world-class companies across the globe and place a strong emphasis on strengthening and expanding the relationships. Al Baida is always excited about developing new partnerships and exploring collaborations and opportunities with new and existing partners mutually benefiting both parties. We have more than 100 partners throughout the world.

cardData.title: Our Mission
cardData.description: Our mission is to make marvels in the world of business leaving no stone unturned. We aim at setting up the greatest consumer-centric business hub at Qatar to pursue alliances and acquisitions that would build strength of our business groups. To serve as a platform that welcomes innovations and transformations is one of our most desirable idea.

cardData.title: Our Vision
cardData.description: Few years from now, we see ourselves as a firm known for its inspiringly sustainable and environment friendly business practices. Establishing strong values and ethical practices would be our gesture to make a community that would grow and glow together. We wish to accomplish novel ideas with a cultural touch, as we always believe in our values.

cardData.title: Our Values
cardData.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

chairmanMsg.title: Message Form Chairman
chairmanMsg.paragraph: “It has been more than 3 decades, and it amazes me to see Al Baida Group unsettlingly strive to uphold a niche on top of the competitive business market. Having been a market leader covering various sectors in Qatar, we have always perpetuated in class and style. We cover almost all the key business sectors of various genres with top-notch quality services. We intend to expand our operations in various other core sectors as well. As much as we are focused in our vision to become an Intern ational business hub, we have always been fascinated to become your trusted partner. With us, you can taste the savour of an incredible partnership and global perspective. We have envisioned ourselves to be a unique entity with the best metrics as sustainable practices, efficiency and impeccable quality. Also, we never compromise on our social, economic and environmental responsibilities. On the whole, it gives me immense pleasure to be a part of this legacy group of companies that contributes monumental strategies to make Qatar an international hub for business and trade by 2022.”
chairmanMsg.name: Ali Bin Abdullatif Almesned
